1008260.name: Where Is The Beach?
1008260.description:
Game
You can finish this game about 15 minutes.
This game is first game of developer.

Beach
You can walk in this area,play with ball,steer the yacht and jump into sea.
+Sea waves
+Bird singings
+Tropical fruits
+Soccer ball
+A yacht
+Gate for car areas (Full time driving time is about 2-3 minutes.)


Story
All of your friends gone.You are alone at this land.The beach entrance door want entrance requirements from you.
This requirements:
An apple
A banana
A cabbage
A jacket
A key

Atmosphere
In first map you are very close to north pole therefore you can see nice green sky.

Traces
There are some traces in game for to found the requirement items.Traces will help you.
There is no fighting in "Where is the Beach"



Gameplay


W A S D for movement

E for Pick up and Enter the ship

Space for Jump

Shift for Speed Run

Mouse left button for shoot the ball
